content:
I do not have personal beliefs or opinions. however, as an ai, i can give you information that can help you arrive at your own conclusion.

classical ballet has a long and rich history, and its artistry and technical mastery continue to inspire and captivate audiences around the world. at the same time, hip-hop dance has gained a huge following in recent decades, especially among young people, and its popularity shows no signs of waning anytime soon. 

in terms of artistic merit, it's difficult to compare these two styles of dance, as they have different approaches to movement, music, and storytelling. both classical ballet and hip-hop dance offer unique and compelling artistic experiences, and each has its own strengths and beauty.

as for popularity, it's impossible to predict the future, but it's worth noting that hip-hop dance has already achieved a tremendous level of popularity and influence around the world. with the rise of social media and other digital platforms, hip-hop dance has become more accessible than ever, and it's possible that its popularity will continue to grow in the years to come.

in terms of which form of dance is considered the most beautiful, that is ultimately a matter of personal taste and opinion. beauty is subjective, and what one person finds beautiful, another may not. both classical ballet and hip-hop dance have their own unique beauty, and it's up to each individual to decide which they find most compelling. ultimately, both styles of dance have enormous artistic merit and bring great joy and inspiration to audiences around the world.
